channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Belgian Chamber

item.title: Opinion Poll by Bpact and Universiteit Antwerpen & ULB for De Standaard, RTBF and VRT, 3–24 March 2025 – Seating Plan Projection
item.description:
Seating plan projection for the Belgian Chamber
76 seats needed for a majority
Opinion poll by Bpact and Universiteit Antwerpen & ULB for De Standaard, RTBF and VRT, 3–24 March 2025
Details on https://filipvanlaenen.github.io/belgian_polls/2025-03-24-BpactandUniversiteitAntwerpenULB.html
